wikipedia.title: Age of the universe
wikipedia.summary: In physical cosmology, the age of the universe is the time elapsed since the Big Bang.

wikipedia.title: Physical cosmology
wikipedia.summary: Physical cosmology is the study of the largest-scale structures and dynamics of the Universe and is concerned with fundamental questions about its origin, structure, evolution, and ultimate fate.

news.title: No Big Bang? Quantum equation predicts universe has no beginning
news.summary: (Phys.org) —The universe may have existed forever, according to a new model that applies quantum correction terms to complement Einstein's theory of general relativity. The model may also account for dark matter and dark energy, resolving multiple problems

news.title: New physics model shows universe might have existed forever
news.summary: A new physics model suggests that the universe may have existed forever, with no beginning or end.

news.title: Kosmologie: Quantentrick schafft Urknall-Singularität ab
news.summary: Ist das Universum unendlich alt? Physiker beseitigen mit quantenmechanischen Korrekturen den Anfangspunkt des Alls. Die Idee scheint charmant, ist aber noch unausgereift.

news.title: Big Bang, Deflated? Universe May Have Had No Beginning
news.summary: If a new theory turns out to be true, the universe may not have started with a bang. In the new formulation, the universe was never a singularity, or an infinitely small and infinitely dense point of matter. "Our theory suggests that the age of the univers

news.title: NASA will soon create the coldest spot in the universe — and forge a bizarre form of matter inside it
